summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackThe ILIA Limitless Lash Mascara is an award-winning clean mascara that lengthens, lifts, and separates with a unique dual-sided wand.
details: DetailsBenefitsDual-sided brush - short bristles curl, long bristles separateNourishing, buildable formulaSafe for sensitive eyes + contact lensesFlake and smudge-resistantRemoves easily with warm waterMono-material tube reduces carbon emissions by 46% and waste by up to 20%**Compared to previous packaging, based on Life Cycle Assessment data from Bluebird Climate2025 Allure Readers' Choice Award WinnerKey IngredientsArginine + Biotin - Lash care heroes that help fortify + strengthen for healthier-looking lashesOrganic Shea Butter - Weightlessly conditions + adds a soft, flexible feelEthically Sourced Beeswax - Nourishes + defines without clumpingResearch Results100% said it lifts, separates, and defines lashes*97% said it doesn't smudge, flake, or crumble**95% said lashes look longer*91% said it nourishes and fortifies lashes***In a clinical study of 42 people after 2 weeks () and immediately (). In a 2-week study of 32 people ()Item 2629323How To UseFor extra lift, use an eyelash curler before applying. Glide the shorter side of the dual-sided wand through lashes to lift and define. Use the longer, comb-like side to lengthen and separate each lash. Apply more coats for a bolder look. To remove, rinse with warm water - no makeup remover needed.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D'Abeille*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba*, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Xanthan Gum, Arginine, Phenethyl Alcohol, Biotin, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Benzoic Acid, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxide). *Organic Ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For extra lift, use an eyelash curler before applying. Glide the shorter side of the dual-sided wand through lashes to lift and define. Use the longer, comb-like side to lengthen and separate each lash. Apply more coats for a bolder look. To remove, rinse with warm water - no makeup remover needed.
ingredients: Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba*

reviews.headline: Mehh
reviews.comments: Wet mascara can me easily applied but BURNS not good for eyes sensitive eyes or eyes with contacts. cute but hurts.

reviews.headline: I would not waste my money!
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this product it goes on really good, but by the end of the day it smears terribly.

reviews.headline: Best mascara ever!
reviews.comments: I love this mascara. It does not bother my sensitive eyes at all. It goes on well. The wand separates lashes better than any I have ever tried. The mascara stays on with no smudging or flaking and then comes off easily with a cleansing wipe.

reviews.headline: Buy it!
reviews.comments: I love this mascara because it not only thickens your lashes but the comb part lengthens them beautifully. Definitely a great product!

reviews.headline: Stinks??? Good Volume Though!
reviews.comments: This is the smelliest mascara I've ever tried.. Strange. The volume and pigment is great and the bottle hasn't dried out after years of having it. From the day I got it, though, I've noticed how bad it smells. It's also a bit clumpy but I just use a clean wand to sort that out. Also, I believe it does flake a bit throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Stinks
reviews.comments: The mascara and wand are fine‚Äînothing great, clumps easily‚Äîbut the smell is horrendous. It's a combination of cheap rose fragrance and super glue, and when wearing I can smell it ALL DAY LONG. Horrible.

reviews.headline: Smells bad
reviews.comments:
From day one this has smelled musty. 
It does an okay job but if you get it on your eye lid, promptly remove it bc its hard to get off of your skin once it dries. 
Idk if i got a bad one, but the smell is all i smell. 
Tossed it.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I normally use Well People Mascara, and sometimes i switch to the Telescopic Mascara, and this product is like an in between, the consistency is similar to Telescopic, but it dries super fast, and it flakes a little bit. I don't touch my lashes work but i do work as a server on the beach so maybe that plays a role in the flakiness, it's a good product but i have to see side by side difference compared to Telescopic.

reviews.headline: Love this mascara
reviews.comments: I love this mascara. I have tried other brands but always repurchase this one.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Am in love with this product.  It separates the lashes and makes them look longer.  Easy to remove.  Did not leave dark circles under my eyes.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I personally like how easily this comes off with makeup remover/water because the worst part of my day is taking of my mascara. I actually highly recommend getting the mini because it lasts forever. I had the full size and it went bad before I could get through it all (started smelling really bad about 5 months in). Love the way my lashes look. I don't really  notice flaking either.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I personally like how easily this comes off with makeup remover/water because the worst part of my day is taking of my mascara. I actually highly recommend getting the mini because it lasts forever. I had the full size and it went bad before I could get through it all (started smelling really bad about 5 months in). Love the way my lashes look. I don't really  notice flaking either.

reviews.headline: Smudges like crazy
reviews.comments: Twrrible. Adds no length and smudges within hours

reviews.headline: Smudges like crazy
reviews.comments: Twrrible. Adds no length and smudges within hours

reviews.headline: Best Mascara!
reviews.comments: I buy these little guys every year as stocking stuffers!  This is my go to mascara and I always want to share it withy friends and family.  No clumps, no spider lashes.  The brush has two different sides to it.  I love it!

reviews.headline: Best Mascara I've Tried
reviews.comments: This is the best mascara I've tried! My lashes are naturally pretty straight and this lifts them and makes them look longer. The wand is really nice for seperatibg them. A lot of reviews are complaining about the smell but I don't mind it ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: It may not work for everyone but for me i love it. a lot of people saying that smells so bad but i think all mascaras smell bad. If you dont like them don't buy it.

reviews.headline: no
reviews.comments: mascara smears badly goes on clumby

reviews.headline: SMELLS AWFUL
reviews.comments: The scent of this is wayyy too strong and caused me to constantly think i needed to take a shower. It looks great when on, but the smell is too much, like dead flowers

reviews.headline: It works ok!
reviews.comments: Feels great on lashes and applies well, doesn't clump but will flake a little. For me it doesn't hold a curl and also has a strong smell.

faceoff_positive.comments: I LOVEEEE this mascara. It advertises as "no flaking", and though I'll say that no mascara is totally immune to flakes, this one gets pretty darn close. And I love how easily it washes off. As comparison, I used to wear Urban Decay's Perversion mascara a lot, and while I enjoyed that I could build it for a bold & dramatic finished look, it was a beast to take off at night. Ilia's mascara is almost as buildable but so much easier to apply & remove. I bet it'll hold up great when I add a few falsie lash bundles, which I'm about to try for an event this weekend. Solid, high-class mascara at a great price & perfect for everyday wear.
faceoff_positive.headline: Good God I Need This By The Gallon

faceoff_negative.comments: So I LOVE LOVE the wand. Great curl and lift. Volume. BUT formula is super wet and takes a while to dry so is easy to smudge and slow if you want to build it up.  Also in general smudges more than Bareminerals or Well people which I have had better luck with. More like Beautcounter in consistency but not quite as smudgey through the day but definitely not the staying power of Wellpeople or Bareminerals. I so wanted to like this becuase the wand is THE BEST....
faceoff_negative.headline: Mixed feelings
